headline: Kinder Morgan (KMI): Exploring Valuation Perspectives After a Year of Strong Shareholder Returns
summary: It is not every day that Kinder Morgan (NYSE:KMI) lands in the spotlight with a surprise announcement or a sudden price jolt. Even in quieter stretches, this pipeline giant can raise eyebrows among investors. Sometimes the market moves just enough to spark debates about whether something fundamental is shifting, or if it is simply business as usual for one of North America’s biggest energy infrastructure players. Over the past year, Kinder Morgan’s stock has returned 35% for shareholders...
